definition: a notation cancelling a previous sharp or flat, to make invalid for use
details:
noun
- a notation cancelling a previous sharp or flat
= synonyms: natural
verb
- to make invalid for use
= example: to make invalid for use
= synonyms: invalidate
- to remove or make invisible
= synonyms: delete
- to declare null and void
= example: to declare null and void
= synonyms: strike down
- to postpone indefinitely or annul something that was scheduled
= example: to postpone indefinitely or annul something that was scheduled
= synonyms: scrub
- to make up for
= example: to make up for
= synonyms: offset
